product_name: Lash Correcting Mascara Remover Set (2 types)
description:
Description


A mascara set that comes with a 30ml lip and eye makeup remover.
A mascara that fixes your eyelashes in second to offer a perfect curl and long lasting effect.
A toothbrush-like applicator helps define and volumize your lashes.
The Swim Proof formula prevents smudging and highly resistance to water, offering a delicate and clean look on your eyelashes.

#01 Hyper Curling:
V-cutting brush offers strong fixing effect and extended fiber formula stretched eyelashes firmly.

#03 Long Extension:
Slim S-line brush to display neat, lenthened lashes.

 
How To Use

Use moderate amount and sweep the brush from lashes root to tip in zigzags.
 
Key Ingredients

Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ceresin, Beeswax, Microcrystalline Wax, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Dextrin Palmitate/Ethylhexanoate, Propylene Carbonate, Cellulose, Rayon, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Silica, Biotin, Isododecane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Panthenol, Copper Tripeptide-1, BHT, Pullulan, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carbon Black Clean Up Lip & Eye Makeup Remover: Purified Water, Carbon Black, Damask Rose Extract, Allantoin, Iron Oxide Black, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Denatured Alcohol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Disteadimonium Hectorite, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydrogenated Polya Isobutene, Iron Oxide Yellow, Fragrance, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Yellow No. 4, Beheneth-30, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Palmitoylpentapeptide-4, Pearl Powder, PEG-20 Sorbitan Isostearate, Silk Amino Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Mastic Gum, Acetylhexapeptide-8, Western Raspberry Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Olive Oil, Sodium Oleoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Damask Rose Flower Water, Bilberry Fruit Extract, BT, Cranberry Extract, Red No. 227, Synthetic Fluorophlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Define Volume: Isododecane, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Hyper Curling: Isododecane, Sodium Chloride, Talc, Dehydro Acetic Acid, Acai Palm Fruit Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ultramarines, Dextrin Palmitate, Hydro Generated Polyisobutene, Black Iron Oxide, Iron Oxide Red, Dehydroacetic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Long Extension: Isododecane, Tocopherol, Caprylyl/CAPryl Glucoside, Benzophenone-9

original_name: [Holika Holika] Lash Correcting Mascara Remover Set (2 types)

description:
Description

A mascara that creates a natural curling effect for the lashes without forming clumps.
Flexible gel formula that contains pearl powders that helps care for the lashes.
Formulated with Lepidum Meyenii Root extract that helps improve lash conditions and elasticity.
Water and sweat-proof formula that does not smudge off easy.
How To Use
Brush over a proper amount onto the eyelashes in a zig-zag motion.
 Key Ingredients

Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Talc, Ceresin, Dextrin Palmitate, Microcrystalline Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Propylene Carbonate, Silica, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Lepidium Meyenii Root Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Xylitylglucoside, Xylitol, Pearl Powder, Dextrin Palmitate/Ethylhexanoate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Nylon-66, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Water, Maltodextrin, Anhydroxylitol, Butylene Glycol, Vinegar, Glucose, 1.2-Hexanediol. product_name: Dailism Smudge Stop Mascara Brown (2 types)
description:
Description
A CLUMP-FREE AND SMUDGE-PROOF TUBING MASCARA THAT PERFECTLY LIFTS YOUR EYELASHES ALL DAY! This tubing mascara defines, separates, and lengthens lashes for a dramatic eye makeup look all day long with no smudging, clumps. ✔ Why tubing mascara? - It coats and holds each lash in water-resistant veggi wax polymers without smudging and gives extra length & volume. ✔ Creates wider & bigger eyes look - Don't forget to apply on bottom lashes! Its micro & curvy wand helps to finish your look quickly without applying on elsewhere. ✔ From AM to PM long lasting - Once applied, the formula holds to your lashes and don't run, smudge, clump, or flake, even if you cry or rub your eyes.✔ No more rubbing, pulling your lashes - Though this is a smudge-proof and water-resistant, it melts down easily with warm water. For the safety of your lashes' sake!  
How To UseSweep on one coat for lashes that are full and defined. Add another coat for a look even more luscious, curled, and dramatic look.To remove the mascara, just apply warm water and gently massage your lashes with your fingertips or washcloth.

original_name: [heimish] Dailism Smudge Stop Mascara Brown (2 types)

description:
Description


The golden ratio of two types of soft and hard gel bases thinly adheres to each eyelash strand to maintain perfect curling all day long. FWEE's special customized slim brush combs up to the hidden straight eyelash to maximize the effect.
#Long&Curl : With a curve that fits the eye perfectly, it gives a delicate extension effect without missing a single strand, and the highly concentrated gel with minimal powder and 2mm fiber creates natural and smooth long eyelashes.
#Volume&Curl : A half & half brush with two types of soft and firm bristles that provides a volume effect without clumping creates a light and rich volume with high-adherence powder and highly oil-absorbing silica.
Two peptides and the triple black food extract mix make strong and clear eyelashes.
How To Use
After using eyelash curler, gently sweep up the lashes from the root of the eyelashes to the tip.

reviews.title: Won't come off!
reviews.content: I have never had this happen with any mascara before- It won't come off my lashes. I have tried mycellar water, cleansing balm, cleansing oil, mild cleansers, harsh cleansers and it's not even half off. I just had 2 coats and it was super clumpy so it didn't even look good. I have lost so many lashes trying to get this stuff off and my eyes are red and so irritated. Used once and have to throw away. Worst mascara ever. Also, they won't offer a refund, and this was the only Korean skincare outlet where I've been charged duties. There are way better stores.

product_name: *renewal* Dr.Mascara Fixer for Perfect Lash (2 types)
description:
Description

- CURLING FIX: This transparent fixing gel mascara including Black mirco fibers offers perfect curl and fix in any environment and climate for the whole day without smudging
- SAY NO TO SHORT AND SPARSE LASHES: Natural extension with no drooping that holds the curl all day
- LONG LASH EFFECT: Fine black fibers naturally elongate the tips of your lashes, giving you the natural long lash effect
- TREATMENT CARE: Infused with Black Food extracts to condition lashes
- FIXER FIRST! Apply fixer at the whole length of lashes and then apply at the end to add fibers. Dry for 10-20 seconds and finish it off with mascara2 types:#Perfect Lash#Super Long Lash
How To Use
Step 1: Coat each lash with the lash fixer
Step 2: Leave 10 to 20 seconds to dry
Step 3: Build up the volume with a mascara!

Key Ingredients
ISODODECANE, VP/EICOSENE COPOLYMER, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SILICA, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, SYNTHETIC WAX, ISOBUTYLMETHACRYLATE/BIS-HYDROXYPROPYL DIMETHICONE ACRYLATE COPOLYMER, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE COPOLYMER, IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE

description:
Description


- This waterproof mascara is presented in two types: Curling and Longlash type.
- Both types coat every strand of your eyelashes and have a strong fixing power.
- Enriched with keratin and 3 types of black bean extracts that provide a nourishing effect.
- The Curling mascara provides a natural permed effect, while the Longlash mascara extends the length 
- The waterproof formula is highly resistant to water and oil keeps the makeup from smudging.
- Helps to create defined and clear eyelashes.
How To Use

Take a moderate amount and then apply it onto the eyelashes. 
Use the curling mascara on your tips. 
Aplly the longlash mascara in a zigzag motion starting from the roots.

description:
Description


1. Bullet-shaped brush finds even hidden eyelashes to create rich volume.
2. It is gently cleansed with lukewarm water and can be used without irritation to the sensitive eye area.
3. The fine polymer adheres to the light, and the more you apply it without clumping, the longer the eyelashes are.

Suggested Use



1. When using for the first time, excessive amount of mascara is applied. Be sure to take an appropriate amount and use it.
2. Apply mascara from the middle of the eyelashes as if sweeping up.
3. Tilt the brush and apply carefully to the front and back of the eyelashes.

description:

-An eyelash serum nourishes and helps strengthen and enhance the eyelashes. 
-Formulated with various nourishing ingredients such as 2 types of Peptides, 17 types of Amino Acids and Sodium Hyaluronate that help enhance the elasticity of the eyelashes. 
-The ball-tip brush and the screw brush help the serum to spread evenly on the eyelashes from the hair root.

Suggested Use

2. Use the screw brush to sweep the eyelashes evenly. 

3. Use the ball-tip brush to tap lightly on the short eyelashes or hair roots.

reviews.title: Soft and Simple Lash Care
reviews.content: Been using this for a few weeks and honestly, I really like it. Super gentle, doesn’t sting at all, and feels nice going on. My lashes look a bit stronger and I’ve noticed less fallout. Nothing dramatic, but a solid, chill addition to my routine.

description:
Description

The Han All Fix Mascara uses a patented "Smart Proof" formula designed to achieve oil and water resistance without clumping or smudging for all-day definition.
The curling fixation lasts long without sagging but at the same time it is easy to wipe off with eye makeup remover at the end of the day. 
The mascara does not irritate the delicate eye area.
The Han All Fix Mascara has two formulas - Long and Volume, and the Long formula comes in 3 colors.
Han All Fix Mascara Volume Black - A slim straight brush that creates a dense volume without clumping. Feels like your natural lashes.
Han All Fix Mascara Long Black - A slim arched brush that neatly extends the length
Han All Fix Mascara Long Ash - A natural cool tone ash color mascara
Han All Fix Mascara Long Hazel - A brown mascara that creates a soft natural look

Suggested Use

-When using the Long mascara type you can make your eyelashes look longer by touching the edges of your eyelashes with the tip of applicator.
-When using the Volume mascara type move the brush in a zigzag motion starting from the root to create a rich volume.

reviews.title: i like it

reviews.title: baddie mascara for a baddie b*tch
reviews.content: dayumm she knows how to work a lash!! It separates the lashes and does not make them look clumpy lumpy like some mascaras I've tried. I use the brown one and it looks nice. You do have to use a makeup remover/cleansing oil/balm situation, otherwise she's gonna be clinging like an ex. Good mascara for a good price!

reviews.title: Very durable
reviews.content: Easy to apply, stays where it should be, confortable

reviews.title: Holds curl like no other
reviews.content: I've tried so many mascara and this holds curls better than the better than sex. Taking it off at night is a little harder but for the holding power I'm willing to put up with it.

product_name: *new* Kill Lash Super Proof Mascara (3 Types)
description:
Description

1. Killer lashes without the clumping
2. Sky high kill-curling
3. Killer fixing with no smudging
* Long Curling 
- The slim curves brush melds perfectly with the curves of the eyes to ensure easy, single-sweep application.
* Volume Curling
- The football shaped brush allows for close application along the eyeline to ensure even the shortest eyelashes get coverage!
Suggested Use
Curl lashes with an eyelash curler, apply appropriate amount on brush and then onto lashes.

reviews.title: Doesn’t live up to hype
reviews.content: Everyone says how extraordinary this mascara is but it’s honestly not. It’s like every other mascara and you can get a far cheaper one that has a thin wand or just wipe off the product in the tube of a larger wand and you’ll get the same affect.

original_name: [CLIO] *new* Kill Lash Super Proof Mascara (3 Types)

description:
Description

Heimish's Dailism Smudge Stop Mascara serves a clump-free and smudge-proof look for your lashes. This mascara also gives your lashes the volume and fixes them in place all day!✔ Smudge-proof ✔ Water-resistant formula✔ Can be washed off with cleanser✔ Holds your lashes in place all day✔ Flake-free (no clumps!)✔ Curvy wand made for convenient usage✔ Smaller tip can be used for bottom lashes
Suggested Use

Sweep on one coat for lashes that are full and defined. Add another coat for a look even more luscious, curled, and dramatic.

description:
Description
Missha the style 4d mascara is a protective layer that formed on each lash, making your eyelashes look full and voluminous​. Square brush Mascara to make clean and thick black eyelashes. Contains botanical wax to volume up each eye lashes. No irritation to sensitive eye area. Highly water-resistant protective film coats the eyelashes, preventing from smudging and improving long-lasting effect.Coats eyelashes to prevent smudge against sweat and water. Dries quickly and keeps clean and glamorous eyelashes longer.
Vegetable wax is mixed in large quantities to achieve smooth application without any dampness or clumps.
Suggested Use
Get an appropriate amount of liquid on brush. 
Apply to eyelashes by sweeping from the root to the tip in zigzag motion. 
Active Ingredients
Water(Aqua), Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Beeswax(Cera Alba), VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, PVP, Triethanolamine, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Lanolin Wax, Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Alcohol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Dimethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA, MAY CONTAIN[+/-; Iron Oxides(CI 77499)] 
​
